# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale the calendar view uses for calendar conventions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var locale: Locale { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/current].

## Setting calendar details

- **calendar**: The calendar that the calendar view illustrates.
- **timeZone**: The time zone from the date the calendar view displays.
